mapper.sql: id, target_id, type, count, create_time, update_time
mapper.update: INSERT INTO like_count (target_id, type, count, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{targetId}, #{type}, #{step}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE count = count + #{step}, update_time = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(lc.count), 0) FROM like_count lc JOIN note n ON lc.target_id = n.id AND lc.type = 1 WHERE n.user_id = #{userId}
